# AgentOS Installation Guide

## Purchase

Get AgentOS from: **https://junaidahmed65.gumroad.com/l/spfzuo**

## Installation

After downloading, run the appropriate installer for your system:

### Linux
```bash
python3 install_linux.py
```

### Windows
```bash
python install_windows.py
```

## What Gets Installed

- AgentOS runtime and CLI tools
- All required Python dependencies
- Desktop application launcher
- Menu entry (Start Menu on Windows, Application Menu on Linux)

## Post-Installation

Find AgentOS in your application menu or run from terminal:
```bash
agentos --help
agentos app  # Launch desktop app
```

## Repository

Source code: **https://github.com/agents-os/agentos**

## Support

For issues and support, visit: https://github.com/agents-os/agentos/issues
